turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a flat white, a tall flat white made with coconut milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said a tall flat white with coconut milk, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which starbucks would you like me to order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order it from the Starbucks at 14300 North East 20th Avenue #203, Vancouver, Washington 98686.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a tall flat white with coconut milk to be picked up at the starbucks on 20th avenue in vancouver, washington.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
